resources.string: You may choose to use this app\'s internal synthesizer for standalone use, or connect to a computer running a MIDI synthesizer through USB.

If you wish to connect to your computer, after plugging in your USB, tap the USB connection notification on your phone and select \"Use device as MIDI\". In your digital audio workstation, find and connect to this phone\'s MIDI device listing. You may need to follow more instructions in your DAW. On your phone, tap \"Test Note\" on the right to test your connection. When in doubt, try unplugging and plugging back in.
